a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Death rate from indoor air pollution in 1990 vs. 2019
Death rates from indoor air pollution in 1990 versus 2019, measured as the number of deaths per 100,000
Death rate from indoor air pollution in 2019
Death rate from indoor air pollution in 1990
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized.
